alert.note: Alert for Essex; King and Queen; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:18PM EDT until July 25 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MIDDLESEX...CENTRAL KING AND QUEEN...SOUTHERN RICHMOND...SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHEASTERN ESSEX COUNTIES... At 617 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Center Cross, or 8 miles northeast of King And Queen Court House, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Farnham around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Laneview, Howertons, Nesting, Wellford, Threeway, Upright, Bowlers Wharf, Ino, Dragonville and Montague. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
